name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Replacement Pool Liner for 12' Round Pools

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Replacement Pool Liner for 12' Round Pools
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality liner, well constructed. I did lots of looking around online and comparing products. I believe this is the best buy out there right now for a 20 gauge liner of this size
reviews.title: A Good Value

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Replacement Pool Liner for 12' Round Pools
reviews.reviewText: Comes with plastic coping strips. Much heavier with more material than less expensive WM products. Expect this to last much longer. According to manufacturer, you can put either the textured or smooth side up-simply (CAREFULLY) trim the excess material around the seam. Used for 12' pool-plenty of overlap-required trimming over sides as well. So far, worth the extra money.
reviews.title: HEAVIER MATERIAL THAN 20G

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Replacement Pool Liner for 12' Round Pools
reviews.reviewText: I do not have one single complaint about this product. It arrived quickly (i paid the extra), it was easy to install and seems to be durable. I do recommend hitting the pump hole with a wet dry vac as filling the pool- it really helped to get the wrinkles out. Otherwise, we used clothes pins to hold it in place as it would have been tedious using the plastic strips while filling and constantly adjusting the liner. we applied the plastic strips afterwards.
reviews.title: Not one complaint

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Replacement Pool Liner for 12' Round Pools
reviews.reviewText:
The liner's seams weren't solid or even. We ended up with a leak after putting it all together. We ordered a second liner (not as pretty) from an online pool company and immediately we could tell the quality was much better.

It's a great price, but the quality was very poor.
reviews.title: defective
